incidents.name: Search in historical data partially inaccessible for small number of customers

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We detected a hardware failure on one of our systems. Small number of customers are affected by this failure. All customer data continues to be collected and stored. But for this small number of customers affected, historical customer data will not appear in search results until we resolve this issue.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are currently investigating this issue.
This incident has been resolved.

In normal operations, it was discovered that the Loggly application was incorrectly calculating the volume of logs ingested into the system. From Midnight UTC, customers may notice the additional incorrect volume in their reports. A fix has been implemented and customers should start seeing corrected volume from tomorrow. For today, we've removed all data limits to avoid any impact on your daily operations. Please reach out to support if you see any additional issues.
